title: Personal Policies
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
This week on #TheFriendZone, it’s the Dustin Ross takeover! Using April and Lil Fizz, of Love & Hip Hop LA, as our study guide, we discuss whether or not dating a friend, peer or associate’s ex is out of bounds. 

The Friend Zone Live is back on the road!
Dallas - October 26th
San Francisco - December 7th
Atlanta - December 14th 
Tickets go on sale this Friday, September 27th at 12pm EST https://www.thefriendzonelive.com 

Black Business of the Week: Virgil’s Gullah Kitchen and Bar https://instagram.com/virgilsgullahkitchen?igshid=14brud1erkmaa

Thank you to our Sponsors:

Simple Health - A better way to get birth control is finally here, with Simple Health. Simple Health is all about care that fits your life – they make birth control simple, convenient, and affordable with online prescriptions & free home delivery. Don’t miss your chance to try Simple Health for free! Just go to simplehealth.com/FRIENDZONE or enter code FRIENDZONE at checkout.

Peloton Tread - This is not another Treadmill. The New York Times says the Peloton Tread is “Like having a personal trainer come to your house whenever you’d like.” Runner's World calls it a “gorgeous, hip NYC gym in the comfort of your own home,” and a “go-to training tool”. Discover the immersive and challenging total body training you can get from Peloton Tread. Peloton is offering listeners a limited-time offer. Go to https://www.onepeloton.com and use code FRIENDZONE to get $100 off accessories with the purchase of a Tread.

Hello Fresh - With HelloFresh, America’s #1 meal kit, you’ll get easy, seasonal recipes and pre-measured ingredients delivered right to your door – all you have to do is cook and enjoy. HelloFresh makes cooking delicious meals at home a reality, regardless of your comfort in the kitchen. From step-by-step recipes to pre-measured ingredients, HelloFresh gives you everything you need to get a wow-worthy dinner on the table in just about 30 minutes. For $80 off your first month of HelloFresh, go to HelloFresh.com/friendzone80 and enter code FRIENDZONE80.

Follow us online:
Twitter - https://twitter.com/FriendZonePod
Facebook - https://Facebook.com/TheFriendZonePodcast

Have a GREAT day!
